The Eli reference is under construction. If you find any problem or you have any suggestion, please leave your comment on our website or contact us via email.

  • System Commands
    • )off Close All
    • )fns List Functions
    • )vars List Variables
    • )lib List Libraries
    • )si Print Error Stack
    • )clear Clear Workspace
    • )wsid Rename workspace
    • )save Save workspace
    • )load Load Workspace
    • )fload Load script
    • )fcopy Copy script
